<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Bag of Cats](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1085)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 75

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This beautiful leather bag is lined in soft fur and purrs quietly when pet.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You shake the bag to produce a single cat. You cast a 3rd-level [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) to produce a [leopard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=67).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pull the bag over your head and it covers you completely. You then exit the bag in the form of a large cat. You gain the effects of 3rd-level [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) but must use the cat battle form.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
